snippet: HERRICK--Rhoda. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Rhoda Herrick, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. Our heartfelt condolences go out to Rhoda's siblings, Edythe Gladst...
lead_paragraph: HERRICK--Rhoda. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Rhoda Herrick, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. Our heartfelt condolences go out to Rhoda's siblings, Edythe Gladstein and Robert Rosenthal; and the entire family. Jeffrey A. Schoenfeld, President; Robert S. Kapito, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
